UADataType.Description: Actual status of the additive provides a minimal error handling for devices without event support.

Field.Name: GOOD
Field.Description: Component has no error or warning.

Field.Name: WARNING
Field.Description: The component has an undefined warning, but no need to stop the production.

Field.Name: ADVANCE_WARNING_ADDITIVE_CHANGE
Field.Description: Warning, additive change is imminent. No need to stop the process.

Field.Name: ERROR_EMPTY
Field.Description: Error, the additive is empty. Production need to be stopped.

Field.Name: ERROR
Field.Description: The additive has an error and process needs to be stopped.

uax:Description.uax:Text: Component has no error or warning.
The component has an undefined warning, but no need to stop the production.
Warning, additive change is imminent. No need to stop the process.
Error, the additive is empty. Production need to be stopped.
The additive has an error and process needs to be stopped.

UADataType.Description: Actual status of the component provides a minimal error handling for devices without event support.

Field.Name: GOOD
Field.Description: Component has no error or warning.

Field.Name: WARNING
Field.Description: The component has an undefined warning, but no need to stop the production.

Field.Name: WARNING_PRESSURE_TOO_HIGH
Field.Description: Pressure is too high. No need to stop the process but influence to the part quality.

Field.Name: WARNING_PRESSURE_TOO_LOW
Field.Description: Pressure is too low. No need to stop the process but influence to the part quality.

Field.Name: ADVANCE_WARNING_DRUM_CHANGE
Field.Description: Warning, barrel change is imminent. No need to stop the process.

Field.Name: ERROR_DRUM_EMPTY
Field.Description: Drum of the component is empty. Production need to be stopped.

Field.Name: ERROR
Field.Description: The component has an error and process needs to be stopped.

uax:Description.uax:Text: Component has no error or warning.
The component has an undefined warning, but no need to stop the production.
Pressure is too high. No need to stop the process but influence to the part quality.
Pressure is too low. No need to stop the process but influence to the part quality.
Warning, barrel change is imminent. No need to stop the process.
Drum of the component is empty. Production need to be stopped.
The component has an error and process needs to be stopped.

UAVariable.Description: Collects the data type descriptions of http://opcfoundation.org/UA/PlasticsRubber/LDS/
Collects the data type descriptions of http://opcfoundation.org/UA/PlasticsRubber/LDS/
Set value to activate the additive
Activate the closed loop control of the additive
Is true if the additive is activated.

UAObject.Description: Contains the SetValue, ActualValue, LowerTolerance and UpperTolerance of the additive fraction in percent

UAVariable.Description: Actual value of the monitored parameter
The start-up alarm suppression deactivates alarms of a monitored parameter during start up or a setpoint jump
Determination if monitoring tolerance parameters are determined by auto-tuning itself (TRUE) or can be manually adjusted (FALSE)

UAObject.Description: With this type the client can do settings for the closed loop control on the device for a parameter

UAVariable.Description: Determination if PID Parameters are determined by auto-tuning itself (TRUE) or can be manually adjusted (FALSE)
Informs if the automatic tuning is currently active

UAMethod.Description: Stops an already active self-optimisation process (no control parameters are changed)
Starts the self-optimisation of the controller

UAVariable.Description: PID Parameters as array if several input signals (sensors) are used for the control
Lower relative tolerance value of the process parameter
Second lower relative tolerance value of the process parameter
Maximum absolute value of the process parameter
Minimum absolute value of the process parameter
Defines how closely the tolerances are set during the automatic limit setting

UAMethod.Description: With this method the tolerance values are set according to the actual value and the set monitoring sensitivity

UAVariable.Description: Indication if SetValue that is lower than the actual value shall be reached as fast as possible (SetRampDown = 0) or within a given value change per time
Indication if a SetValue that is higher than the actual value shall be reached as fast as possible (SetRampUp = 0) or within a given value change per time
Set/nominal/target value of the monitored parameter
Information if the ActualValue is within the tolerances or has passed a tolerance or min/max value
Upper relative tolerance value of the process parameter
Second upper relative tolerance value of the process parameter

UAObject.Description: Defines the value of additive per shot/stroke

UAVariable.Description: Actual value of the monitored parameter
The start-up alarm suppression deactivates alarms of a monitored parameter during start up or a setpoint jump
Determination if monitoring tolerance parameters are determined by auto-tuning itself (TRUE) or can be manually adjusted (FALSE)

Informs if the automatic tuning is currently active

UAVariable.Description: Indication if SetValue that is lower than the actual value shall be reached as fast as possible (SetRampDown = 0) or within a given value change per time
Indication if a SetValue that is higher than the actual value shall be reached as fast as possible (SetRampUp = 0) or within a given value change per time
Set/nominal/target value of the monitored parameter
Information if the ActualValue is within the tolerances or has passed a tolerance or min/max value
Upper relative tolerance value of the process parameter
Second upper relative tolerance value of the process parameter
Is true if the closed loop control of the additive is activated
Informs the client if the additive is physically present.
Actual status of the additive provides a minimal error handling for devices without event support.
Average pressure of the additive during the last cycle at the measuring point
Actual ratios of additive in percentage
Target ratios of additives in percentage which are set in AdditiveFraction of AdditiveType
Number of the dosing cycle
Duration of the dosing cycle
Average material pressure during the last cycle before the filter
Average material pressure during the last cycle after the filter
Average pressure of component A during the last cycle at the blender
Average pressure of component B during the last cycle at the blender
Average pressure of components A&B during the last cycle at the blender
Actual mixing ratio of the components
Target mixing ratio of the last cycle (includes ratio change when MaterialBalanceSystem is active)
Residual weight amount of component A at the end of the dosing cycle
Residual weight amount of component B at the end of the dosing cycle
Volume of component A that was added to the process in the last cycle
Volume of components A + B that was added to the process in the last cycle
Volumes of the additives that were added to the process in the last cycle
Volume of component B that was added to the process in the last cycle
Volume of all components (A + B + all additives)

UAObjectType.Description: Information about the mixing components A and B

UAVariable.Description: Actual pressure of the component
Expected number of remaining cycles with the current drum
Time until the material of the component is empty
Residual amount of the material

UAMethod.Description: This optional method is used to modify SetValueDensity if allowed by the device.

UAVariable.Description: Set point material density
Actual status of the component provides a minimal error handling for devices without event support.

UAObjectType.Description: Root ObjectType representing a LSR dosing system with its subcomponents

UAVariable.Description: This variable is used to release the drives of the dosing system. If the value is FALSE, the LDS shall not be able to start ist drives.
With this Property the client can set the desired language on the user interface at the LDS

UAObject.Description: Identification of the device

UAVariable.Description: Indicates in which domain or for what purpose a certain device is used
Provides the name of the manufacturer of the machine
Represents the name of the machine type
Represents the serial number of the machine (unique ID given by the manufacturer)
Represents the year of construction of the machine

UAObject.Description: Infomration about the machine configuration

UAMethod.Description: Method for retrieving a screenshot of the control system with the currently shown contents
Method for retrieving the image of a page of the control system

UAVariable.Description: Description of the location of the machine given by the machine operator or OPC client
List of the pages that are implemented in the machine control system and are shown on the screen of the machine

UAMethod.Description: Method for setting the server time together with TimeZoneOffset

UAVariable.Description: Difference of the local time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) given by the machine operator or OPC client
Description of the machine given by the machine operator or OPC client

Actual deviation of the mixing ratio (in percent)
Specifies the value determined by the feeder as the shot weight

UAMethod.Description: The peripheral device on which this method is called shows itself by e.g. activation of a LED.

UAVariable.Description: Type of the material balance system
Used to limit the maximum deviation in percent
Target of the mixing ratio (includes ratio change when MaterialBalanceSystem is active)
Depending on this preselected PurgeMode, various purge function can be activated via the dosing signal of the IMM
Actual status of the purge function
Remaining time until first material is empty
With this signal, the LDS signalizes, if it is ready to be controlled via this or a separate interface

UAMethod.Description: Method to reset all errors of the device
Method to reset one error of the device
Method to set the cycle number of the LDS to synchronize it with the cycle number of the injection moulding machine

UAVariable.Description: Reference value determined by the IMM or defined by the user on the IMM side
The composite set point of density

UAMethod.Description: If RemoteControlActivated = 2, this Method (without arguments) is used to start the dosing

UAVariable.Description: This deviation (in percent) is set/used by the material balance system
